Description: Knights Bridge II Apartments is a luxurious community offering a private, park-like setting, and homes designed to fit every lifestyle. Located next to Fairland Regional Park with over 150 acres of parkland developed for recreational use, Knights Bridge II Apartments is minutes away from a football/soccer field, tennis courts, lighted ball fields, batting cages, an aquatic center and more! Our community is also easily accessible to Columbia Pike/Rt. 29 and the ICC with access to I-95(I-495). Whether your commute takes you to the Columbia/Baltimore area, Washington DC, or Gaithersburg area, Knights Bridge II is convenient to them all. Come see your new home at Knights Bridge II Apartments today! Where can you find apartment living better than this?

Description: Country Place offers generous one, two, and three bedroom apartment homes. Our apartment homes boast plush wall to wall carpeting and individually controlled heat & air conditioning. Laundry facilities are not in your future because each home is equipped with its own washer and dryer. Modern gas cooking and full size refrigerators make kitchen duty a pleasure. Have coffee in your sunroom eat-in kitchen, or relax and enjoy the view from your balcony or patio. These are just a few of the great amenities at Country Place. All of our apartment homes were thoughtfully designed with all the comforts of home.

Description:
Spacious 3 level 3BR/2.5BA Townhouse for rent with finished basement and fireplace. Located in Burtonsville, MD off Route 198 in Montgomery County. Close to Route 29 and Route 198 intersection. Convenient to Baltimore, Columbia, and DC.
Freshly painted. Eat-in kitchen, walkout finished basement, fireplace, large deck, and fenced-in backyard. Washer/Dryer. Plenty of parking. Backs to walking/fitness trail and pond.
Walking distance to public transportation (off of Metro bus line).
Montgomery County excellent school district.
Minutes to Routes 95/29/198/Route 1/ICC.
House available: Oct. 1, 2017
Terms: Rent is $1950/month. Tenant responsible for electric and water utilities.
Credit check required.

Description: Bright townhouse in gorgeous park-like setting. Hardwood floors and ceramic tile throughout. Complete renovation in 2006 of kitchen and baths including all new cabinets all new windows and roof. New kitchen range microwave refrigerator and HVAC 2017. Deck with gorgeous lake view. Finished lower level with tile floors. Walkout to patio. Fireplace with mantel. No smoking; pets case by case.

Spacious 3 Level Townhouse Backing to Trees! 2 Master Suites Hardwood Floors Stainless Appliances Granite Breakfast Area Deck Finished Walkout Basement Stone Patio Fenced Back Yard Washer/Dryer in Unit Freshly Painted New Windows and Doors may lower Utilities! 2 Year Lease & Quick Move-In Preferred Available immediately!
